title: Soft and Smooth
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Then, when you’re done with the lotion, put on this face mask and leave it on for 10 minutes.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Face.... mask?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>That’s right, you put this mask on your face. I’ll put it on for you. It’s a bit cold, but bear with it, okay....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hyau! So cold!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Alright, it’s done. Look in the mirror.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>....Pfft, ahaha! My face is all white nya~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Your skin is already soft, but this mask will make it even smoother, Rin-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Heeeh~, Rin is looking forward to that nya~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Then I guess I’ll wear one too.... Ufufu, how do I look~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ahahaha, your face is also all white, Karin-san! Now we match nya~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
